channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Recently repaired pothole has already failed, 8th April
item.description:
Recently repaired pothole has already failed opposite lay-by by council tip.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swindon Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Recent pothole repair has already failed, 8th April
item.description:
The recent repair of pothole on left hand side of swindon Road bridge heading towards Windyridge Road has already failed this in my opinion causes a safety issue for both pedestrians and vehicles as drivers try to avoid it on this narrow bridge
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swindon Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.description:

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW10 Potholes problem, 8th April
item.description:
Carriageway pothole 800 x 600 x 70mm. This has been made safe with sign and cone. STOP AND GO. (CW10 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged Openreach manhole cover, 8th April
item.description:
Wellspring Road opposite Badman chemist & Co Op. Openreach manhole cover was damaged several months ago by 18 wheeler parked on pavement during installation of mobile phone mast. Concrete has now given way on the cracked cover, this hole will likely become larger causing potential hazard of collapse whilst some is stood on it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 131, Old Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Deep Pothole, 8th April
item.description:
Can you repair this Pothole. I got it last week and had a Puncture cost Â£180 for a new tyre and fitting. I just hit it again and hope I don't get a puncture today!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barriers behind railings in grass, 7th April
item.description:
Barriers before and after bridge over M5 in grass verge. These are from previous roadworks approximately 6 to 9 months ago and have been left by contractors. They have been placed over the railings/barrier, travelling in the direction of Badgeworth/Cheltenham and need to be recovered by the contractor.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brookfield Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two large potholes on Bridgend Road, 7th April
item.description:
Where Bridgend Road meets Unwin Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Bridgend Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Verge needs maintaining and bush blocks view, 7th April
item.description:
The verge is a mess full of weeds. On the corner of haymakers road there is also a large bush that blocks your view when you are turning right - can this be removed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Haymakers Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole of Bayshill Rd is in a poor state with multiple potholes, 7th April
item.description:
You need to look at the whole length of Bayshill Road from Ladies College ( going up the hill with college on your left) as there are many damaged areas, potholes. The same applies when you turn right up Parabola Rd and then on into Overton Rd. Proper resurfacing ( no cowpat infills PLEASE!) is what's needed I feel
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large potholes on narrow road so vehicles driving on verges,a number of potholes and movement of the carriageway through the gates and up the hill., 7th April
item.description:
Along Crippetts Lane (a no-through road) past pigs on the right, dog training field on left just before the metal gates each side of the road. When you go past the gates and the farm entrance on the right problems all the way up the lane with road movement,
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crippetts Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Resurface urgently needed, 7th April
item.description:
This section of road is dangerously unsafe for all road users, especially cyclists and oncoming traffic. Most traffic east-bound is using the oncoming lane to avoid damaging their vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 157, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Craters in lane 1A40 westbound, 7th April
item.description:
Large unavoidable craters in road surface of lane 1 A40 westbound, unsafe for high-speed 70mph carriageway. This whole section of lane 1 needs resurfacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 6th April
item.description:
